channel.title: Deleting Pots When Finished

item.title: Deleting Pots When Finished
item.dc:creator: @winK winK
item.description:
@winK wrote:

I’m having trouble deleting the item when I’ve finished a potion. Before, it would replace it with a vial, but since I have flasks, I simply want it to delete the item.

The previous code was:

Which got the slot of the potion, found out if it had more doses left, if not, make it into a vial. So, I changed it to this, to make it delete the item if there are no doses left:

player.getInventory().deleteItem(pot,1); if(dosesLeft > 0 && toPot < pot.id.length) { player.getInventory().addItem(pot.id[toPot], 1); }

But I get this error:

src\com\rs\game\player\content\Pots.java:617: error: no suitable method found fo r deleteItem(Pot,int) player.getInventory().deleteItem(pot,1);
Obviously, I’m not putting in the right argument for the deleteItem, but what do I used to find the id of the current potion they are drinking?

Read full topic
